description: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Likelihood is related to how often the paths are used in the environment
name: Suspicious Mstsc.EXE Execution With Local RDP File
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\mstsc.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"mstsc.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*.rdp" OR "*.rdp\"") AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks_Migrated\ *" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Tracing\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\Downloads\\*"))
